Exaggeration: The claim exaggerates by stating that Virginia Gov. Ralph Northam is planning to cut off the electricity to prevent residents from revealing what is happening during gun confiscation.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence to support the assertion that Gov. Northam is planning to cut off electricity.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that gun confiscation is taking place or will take place in Virginia.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that the claim is misinformation spread by a white supremacist with a history of spreading conspiracy theories.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Gov. Northam has stated he is not going to take people's guns away.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement bias in this claim.
Falters at times: There is no evidence of the claim faltering at times bias in this claim.
